description: Describes a clock referenced to PTP
title: PTP clock

id.description: id for this refclock (unique for this set of clocks)

ref_type.description: Type of external reference clock used by this clock

traceable.description: external refclock is synchronised to International Atomic Time (TAI)

version.description: Version of PTP reference clock used by this clock

gmid.description: ID of the PTP reference clock used by this clock

locked.description: Lock state of this clock to the external clock. If true, this device is slaved, otherwise it has no defined relationship to the external clock
